dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: What is Firefox Focus for Android?

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Living in Germany, Austria or Switzerland?

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: is the German language version of Firefox Focus. See

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: I can't find Firefox Focus in Germany, Austria or Switzerland

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Firefox Focus gives you a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking on your Android phone or tablet.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Use Firefox Focus as a browser

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Customize your Firefox Focus protection settings

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Firefox Focus is available in the Google Play store for free. When it’s finished downloading, look for the icon on your home screen or app drawer.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Use Firefox Focus as a browser

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Use Firefox Focus as a browser dedicated to your privacy and security. Easily erase your browsing history, passwords, bookmarks and cookies and prevent unwanted ads from following you.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Whenever you want a private tracker-free experience, fire up Firefox Focus. Firefox Focus is easy to use. Just enter your search or website address in the field:

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: To share a page or open it in Firefox for Android or another browser, tap the menu button at the top right and choose from either the share icon, or the option to

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: to open a page in another browser.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Erase all information about your session at any time by tapping the Erase button:

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Customize your Firefox Focus protection settings

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Customize the level of content blocking and tracking protection that you need. Default search engine: to change your default search, see

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Change your default search on Firefox Focus for Android

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Tap the menu button at the top right corner.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Tap the switch next to each feature to turn it on or off.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Tap the back button or close Firefox Focus. Firefox Focus will save your changes automatically.

dynGuiComponents.text: Firefox Focus and Klar Privacy Notice — Mozilla

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Firefox Focus and Klar Privacy Notice

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: At Mozilla, we design products with your privacy in mind. This privacy notice explains what data we collect in Focus and Klar, why, and your choices. Our statements about Firefox Focus apply to both Focus and Klar unless we say otherwise. We also adhere to the practices outlined in the

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: for how we receive, handle and share information we collect from Firefox Focus.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Firefox Focus is available in the Google Play store for free. When it’s finished downloading, look for the icon on your home screen or app drawer.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Use Firefox Focus as a browser

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Use Firefox Focus as a browser dedicated to your privacy and security. Easily erase your browsing history, passwords, bookmarks and cookies and prevent unwanted ads from following you.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Whenever you want a private tracker-free experience, fire up Firefox Focus. Firefox Focus is easy to use. Just enter your search or website address in the field:

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: To share a page or open it in Firefox for Android or another browser, tap the menu button at the top right and choose from either the share icon, or the option to

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: to open a page in another browser.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Erase all information about your session at any time by tapping the Erase button:

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Customize your Firefox Focus protection settings

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Customize the level of content blocking and tracking protection that you need. Default search engine: to change your default search, see

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Change your default search on Firefox Focus for Android

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Tap the menu button at the top right corner.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Tap the switch next to each feature to turn it on or off.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Tap the back button or close Firefox Focus. Firefox Focus will save your changes automatically.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: What's new in Firefox Focus for Android (version 7)

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: This article is no longer maintained, so its content might be out of date.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Here are the changes you'll see in this version of Firefox Focus for Android:

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: We've added search suggestions so you can get to websites faster. See

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Search suggestions in Firefox Focus for Android

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: We've added tips on the home page to help you get to popular features fast.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.view.View
dynGuiComponents.text: Firefox Focus is now powered by GeckoView for a faster and more secure browsing experience. Learn more at
